Mods.Name: DEVTESTMODPACK
Mods.Author: KolbenLP
Mods.Description: DONT MIND ME this wont work for ya. Dont click download. Just ignore for now

Mods.Name: Enhanced Vanilla
Mods.Author: Nicull
Mods.Description:
Adds every single mod that enhances the vanilla experience, it does not include Rundens A.I or the RHD cars (since they dont make much sense in the game)

The best way to play the game!

-Adds diesel engines and a new V8
-New cars
-New rims
-Physics lock for all cars
-tire wear
-turbo
-plate edit
-Spoilers for lada and golf
-Fuel, temperature and RPM gauges
-Caddy towhitch
-Physical ignition switch for all cars
-Breakable crates
-Fuel consumption mod
-Realistic Handbrake
-Mount anywhere
-Automatic transmissions
-And the gutted ikarus mod 

1.2 Changelog:
-Removed Serenas physlock mod since it caused a few issues
-Updated all mods

Known bugs:
Tire wear mod causes your starting car to not have any grip. Just save and load when you start a new game to fix this.

-Use manual only, main menu automatic transmission/clutch break one of the mods

Mods.Name: One of the best Modpacks (hopefully)
Mods.Author: Mazda Astina GT
Mods.Description:
This is my modpack that contains 21 mods and those mods are:

 Multi-Engine Mod (file name - uhhhh_mod_that_lets_you_the_engine), 
TLD Spawner ESC Edition,
 Simple UI Gauge Mod,
 Serena V8 Engine (gas) mod,
 Runden Physics Gun mod,
 Runden Mount Anywhere (fixed) mod, 
Runden Handbrake mod,
 Runden Turbo mod,
 Runden RHD mod,
 Runden Lada Spoiler mod,
 Runden Lada VAZ2104 mod,
 Runden Lada VAZ2107 (works nicely with 2104 mod),
 Push Harder mod,
 No Rocks On Road mod,
 No Sleep Cooldown mod,
 Nicull Spoiler For Golf mod,
 Car Info Text (file name - CarInfotainmentText),
 Better Crates mod and BeamNG Caravan mod.
No Rabbits mod (file name - no_buns)

Those are all mods from version 1.3.

And huge thanks to Kolben for making it look even better, by ''sorting'' the description so it won't be mess and for adding it on the workshop (basically doing everything for me)!

Made by Mazda Astina GT#6224 on discord, if you found anything try to tag me on the GeneServer server and if you have any questions dm me.

Version 1.2 changelog:
-added No Rabbits mod
-updated description (as always)

Made by Mazda Astina GT#6224 on discord, if you found anything about my modpack try to tag me on the GeneServer server and if you have any questions dm me.

Version 1.3 changelog:
-added Runden Automatic mod
-Updated all mods on latest version
-updated description (as always)

Mods.Name: All The Mods 1
Mods.Author: KolbenLP
Mods.Description:
First Modpack ever. 
 You probably know the Minecraft Modpack All The Mods. Also this name is self explaining. 
 Does it contain every mod? No, well almost. It contains almost every Workshop Mod

Mods.Name: Encolumned's Simplicity
Mods.Author: Encolumned
Mods.Description:
Bare bones car mods for enhancing what types of cars you can find. No items added, just QoL mods and Car Mods, such as:
 
2104 and 2107 Lada Riva Estate by RUNDEN
RHD Mod by RUNDEN 
Automatic Transmissions by RUNDEN 
Caddyhitch by Serena
Irakus Phys. Lock [NOT GUTTED] by Serena
Physlock for all Cars by Serena

If you have any issues with the modpack, please contact me on the discord through DMs, then I will try to contact the respective people depending on the issue.

Mods.Name: Hardcore Modpack
Mods.Author: Maspunch
Mods.Description:
A bunch of mods which make the game slightly harder and more interesting if you want some challenge 
 
Serenas Rims 
Rundens Tire Damage
Rundens Automatic Autotragic 
Rundens RHD 
Rundens Lada Spoilers 
Rundens Disable Loot Spawn 
Runden Breakable Rocks 
Rundens AI 
Rundens 2104 
Rundens 2107 Estate 
Ghaleas Diesel Cars 
Coolgamers Exploding Cacti

Mods.Name: TumpyNoodles Exquisite Extentions
Mods.Author: Tumpy_Noodles
Mods.Description:
--Everything You Need For a Good Time--
With NO Junk only Quality money back Guaranteeâ„¢

An extensive list of nothing but quality mods including every Mod Car, Engines, and Gauges, and includes Rims, Turbos, Automatic & Rhd Cars. Along with quality of life such as Trabant-Rad, Caddy-Hitch, Fast-Pedal, Iron-Sights, Mount-Anywhere, and utillities like Carinfotainment, Spawner, WheelPosEditor, SaveFileClearOut, AutosaveInterval, and DisableLootRespawn. 

Note: this mod pack comes with a autosave interval of 240s (default 100s)

Controls:
F2 -- Car Infotainment
F6 -- AutoSave
F8 -- AutoSave Interval
F10 -- SaveFileClearOut
Insert (with 1000km driven) -- Spawner
Scroll Lock -- WheelPosEditor
